question: Your local council is considering closing a sports and leisure center that is runs, in order to save money.Write a letter to the local council. text: I would like to inform you that, the sport and leisure centre which are located in the Kandy town provides a considerable huge social service to the public. Most enjoy the benefit of said centre. In the evening, most of them are attending to the sports centre to keep their well-being of life. Furthermore, some relaxation activities such as meeting friends, and playing sports in groups provide spending leisure time more effectively.
Nowadays, most doctors have advised potions, going for  daily exercises as well relax their minds through leisure activities. That provides a healthier person to the society.

Accordingly, the centre provides more valuable social services in order to earn money. There would be negative effects for the public if it will be closed in nearly future. As well as it will be a directing people to the society by playing sports as well as their mind relaxation. Therefore, I kindly request you to reconsider the decision prior to closing the centre permanently.
